title: Delivery Person
description: Responsible for delivering packages to customers' doors or businesses in a timely manner.

title: Plumber
description: Installs, repairs, and maintains piping systems in homes and businesses.

title: Painter
description: Applies paint, stain, or other finishes to surfaces like walls, ceilings, and furniture.

title: Mechanic
description: Repairs and maintains vehicles, machinery, and equipment to ensure they function properly.

title: Builder
description: Constructs buildings and other structures by assembling materials like brick, stone, and wood.

title: Gardener
description: Takes care of plants, gardens, and landscaping to enhance the aesthetic value of outdoor spaces.

title: Carpenter
description: Works with wood to create furniture, buildings, and other structures.

title: Blacksmith
description: Uses heat and tools to shape metal into useful items such as tools, weapons, and equipment.

title: Goldsmith
description: Crafts and repairs jewelry and other objects from gold, silver, and precious stones.

title: Tailor
description: Alters and repairs clothing, creating custom designs to fit the needs of clients.

title: Craftsperson
description: Creates handmade objects and works of art, often using a variety of materials and techniques.

title: Leatherworker
description: Designs and creates products from leather, including bags, clothing, and accessories.

title: Welder
description: Uses welding tools to join metal pieces together, often in construction or manufacturing.
